title: Messages with large data are in 'sending' status

labels.name: status-waku-integ
labels.description: All issues relating to the Status Waku integration.

milestone.title: 1.27.0 - Alpha
milestone.description:
### This release will be used for internal dogfooding

Mobile dev team priorities In priority order:

**1. Finish anything that wasn't completed in the previous 1.26 cycle**

**2. Select which accounts to share with each Community's control node**
- Designs should be ready for review and dev feedback by 18th September

**3. Settings home screen**
- the settings home screen only

**4. Fix bugs, both functional and UX fit-and-finish defects.**  

- specifically focus on bugs related to the Communities functionality, when a community is utilizing all the community admin functionality available in Status Desktop

- any remaining UX quality defects

- ensure all community token gating related functionality is working

body:
## Problem 
The bug is not reproducible on the current develop branch 
### Steps:
1. Attempt to send a message containing large data. This message should consist of at least 5000 characters, 6 images, and 6 links that need to be resolved. (now the message is in 'sending' status)
2.  Attempt to send messages with album


### Actual behavior
Sending a message of large size results in remaining in the 'sending' status. Furthermore, subsequent messages after sending such a message often display the 'sending' status as well, particularly messages containing images.

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/52490791/bb7346c7-c0f9-4096-98ba-66e95535fd4f


### Expected behavior
The message should be successfully delivered


### Additional Information
- builds release version: [22 Dec 2023, 09:44]
- Operating System: Android, iOS

### Logs:
[Status-debug-logs.zip](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/files/13752285/Status-debug-logs.zip)
Note: these messages are stayed in "sending" state forever (or sometimes in hours) and there is no way to re-send them

Hi @VolodLytvynenko ,
I can't reproduce this issue with latest `develop` branch and 2 ios simulators ATM.
I tried with following steps:
- Copy following text which contains 5623 characters and 6 links:
```


https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/18280
https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/18282
https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/18283
https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/18284
https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/18285
https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/18281


```
- Paste it into chat input
- Select 6 images and press send message button

Screen records for the 2 users:

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/12406719/9d6dc0c7-578d-40fc-98b7-fc8df2793f05

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/12406719/245742b8-a223-4036-98a3-1bd004435c02

cc @pavloburykh 

Can you recheck it with builds relate to this [PR](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18533) to see if it's still reproducable or i missed something? thank you!

> Can you recheck it with builds relate to this [PR](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18533) to see if it's still reproducable or i missed something? thank you!

Hi, @qfrank can't reproduce it anymore. I think issue can be closed. Thank you!
